Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 26th overall pick, by Coney Island in 1970...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/29/1982, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
Injured on 8/1/1983 with a Fractured Elbow, out for 9-10 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Plum Grove on 2/2/1987 to a 3-year deal worth $4,961,000 per year...
